# Long Arm (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Alchemist Spells|Alchemist 1]], [[1st Level Assassin Spells|Assassin 1]], [[1st Level Bloodrager Spells|Bloodrager 1]], [[1st Level Magus Spells|Magus 1]], [[1st Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 1]], [[1st Level Summoner Spells|Summoner 1]], [[1st Level Witch Spells|Witch 1]], [[1st Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 1st-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 1]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 1 minute/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Advanced Class Guide, pg. 186

Your arms temporarily grow in length, increasing your reach with those limbs by 5 feet.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* Added Assassin 1 to Level.
